comments: Awesome class. My friend took this class from her last year and told me to. Glad I did. I loved how we could say anything and be really open.
Great class. I learned a lot and will take more classes from Mzik.

All you do in class is talk with her! She is funny and makes the text easy to understand. Kelly Mzik has been one of my favorite professors at Dixie. If you read the chapters and show up for class you will get an A. The test are not hard at all! The "final" was one of the funniest things I have ever experienced in class.
Loved her class, Can\'t wait to take speech with her. She makes the class fun and lets you know what you\'re doing wrong so that you have time to fix it.

I have her for Interpersonal Comm and I really enjoy her class. The class is very challenging and she makes it crystal clear to understand. I love the open forum atmosphere of her class where everyone is able to give their opinions and views without being criticized. I strongly recommend her!
